attributes.action: Axe Income Tax for Those on Minimum Wage and Below
attributes.additional_details: That the Chancellor of the Exchequer remove those on minimum wage or below from the burden of income tax. This will put more money into people's pockets and, in very difficult financial circumstances,, enable the lowest paid to benefit . It will encourage people into work and if the minimum wage is also applied to those over 16 who are working, will give more spending power to peole at large, encourage growth and sustain employment.
